content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-7.5, 23.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Boiler at position(-7.5, 23.0)
- Offshore pump at position(-9.5, 24.5)
- Pipe group at position(-9.5, 23.5) connecting the boiler and offshore pump

### Copper plate mine at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position(0, 0) and a furnace at position(0, 0)
- Burner mining drill at position(5, 5) and a furnace at position(5, 5)

### Lab at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab at position(0, 0)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using attributes that do not exist
- Ensure to check the available attributes of an object before attempting to access them. In this case, the 'ElectricityPole' object does not have a 'neighbours' attribute.

### Errors when inserting items from inventory
- Ensure that you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into another entity. In this case, the boiler had no coal to insert from the inventory. 

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity on a tile before attempting to place it.
